A date can change everything.

-For the good or for the bad.
-Yeah.

saddled up.
Wow, pretty good for a city boy.

-[horse neighs]
-[Carrington] Whoa.

The whole threat with Lauren...
[sighs] That's over with.
[Matthew] But the happy trails...

We're in a very early stage,
and it could be somebody else.

Included something like,
"We never know what's gonna happen."

I don't think you should
ignore these things.

I still just kind of need to...
take it a little slower.

The islanders in the bottom three couples
risk being dumped from the island tonight.

[Matthew] Vegas, the neon playground
of the sexy and sanitized.

Yeah, not really sure

Yeah.

I had fun.

is Connor saying really bad things

-Yeah.

...I do think I'm very

I wasn't upset that he pie'd me.

And I did feel like it wasn't fair.

-It's just a game.

-Like...
-Exactly.
But it was embarrassing, you know.

And that's completely, you know,
valid for thinking that way, too.

I did not like watching it.

I want his full honesty

And I don't think

but, like, I'm saying y'all
are taking it too slow emotionally.
Yeah.

I am not ready to put all

With James I was, like,

110 percent by day, like, two
And that bit me in the butt.

A hundred percent,
thank you for coming to me.
I totally get it.

For Justine, Caleb is like a book

div.p:
-All right. Okay, so let me fill you in.
-Yeah, fill me in, por ...

-Por favor.
-Let me fill you in.

Okay, I was talking to the girls
because I was like, "Guys,

I'm really into Caleb,
but he is so hard to read."

Like, you're the hardest person,
like, you're literally a mystery.

-No.
-Like a mystery, I was like,

"He's harder to read than anybody
I have ever met in my life."

What are you reading?
What are you picking up?

I don't know, like,
maybe you're not that interested?
Like, I don't know.
And I'm just trying to figure it out.
[sighs] Damn.

I feel like I am trying to, like,
holler at you a little bit

and flirt a little bit and, like,
every single time I see you

or... every time you change outfits
or whatever, I'm like,

"Wow, you look good.
Wow, your swimsuit looks good.

Wow, your face is golden, wow."
You know what I am saying? Like...
Don't overthink it.
But you, you know,

up in there like that, I like that.
Doesn't bother me.
Okay, good.

I went into this conversation with Caleb
like... [sighs]

I'm about to express everything
I'm feeling and he's going to be like,
"Oh, lightbulb."

But instead, I say what I say,
he said what he said

and I was like, "Oh,
it would make so much sense now."

-Okay. Let me say this.
-[Caleb mutters indistinctly]

-My love language is physical touch.
-Okay.

And so I think that's why
I am having a very hard time.

And I'm not saying that, like,
you know, anything crazy, whatever.

But just little things
because that's just how I am.
I have been in relationships

but I really haven't spent a lot
of time with a significant other.

I'm kind of a shy person, uh...
when it comes to this specific thing.
So...

She needs to encourage me
and kind of push me a little bit,

and understand that I just
need to come out of my shell.
But as far as being open to it,

obviously that's what I am working
towards.

This is great. This is telling me,
you know, how you feel.

What you like, what you need in a
relationship and all that stuff.
And, like, that's... what we need to know.

The more I spend time with Caleb,
the more I wake up next to him,

every single day it just
gets better and better.
I like Caleb.
It might be a problem.

-[Justine] Thank you for talking to me.
-On my sweaty back.

The way that Kierstan wants to be treated,
which is...

very touchy, very reassuring,
every second of the day, like,

"I miss you, I like you, I like you.
Hey, just letting you know,

I still like you."
Like, that kind of stuff, I don't do.
The way that Kierstan wants to be loved,

and the way that I love
is totally different.

And even if I said I was all in
and went for it, it wouldn't work.

It's an ultimatum I'm going to have to...
to come to.

[Matthew] With things uncertain
between Kierstan and Carrington,

what the giant pink neon sign
has been yelling at them to do

div.p:
Have you and Carrington talked
ever since after the date

-and everything you were talking about?
-I don't really think...

-Oh, no.
-I don't know, I hope it's not waning,
like, going away.

But you saw how so excited
I was the first couple of days.

-And you still are.
-And I am,

but he's...
I don't see it from him, either.
[sighs]

p.span: to know where he stands because

div.p:
He can't just have me waiting around
and all in and taking his sweet time.

I want him to be showing a little more
effort than what he is now.

Like, even if it was just a little
bit more.

Yeah, I feel like
it just shouldn't take...
more people coming in here...

-Exactly.
-...for him to have to realize...

-Right.
-...you're what he wants.
And if he's not giving that to you, like,
it's something you, like...

-I feel like you need to talk about...
-Yeah.
...because his reaction to what you say...

-[Kierstan] Says a lot.
-A hundred percent.
I know that it is hard, but it's like...

-these are the times...
-[moans] Trying not to take my own advice.

[Cely] But these are the tough
conversations you have to have.

[Kierstan] Does he even care about this?
Is he getting too comfortable?
There is no reason I should hold back.
It's going to be hard.

I actually wanted to talk to you
real quick.
All right.

-Where should we go?
-Wherever.
I don't know, why don't you pick?

That's why it's best to just...
go with the flow.

[Carrington] What do you want to talk
about, though?
Um, well, I was just thinking...
I just want to see...

where your head's at
with new people coming in still.

I told you I'm all in,
and I am excited to see where this goes,

but I will be honest and say
that I feel you are...
kind of losing interest.
I definitely haven't been giving you

-what you need for sure.
-Uh-huh.
Like, I see it, I know it.

I'm not the kind of person
I wish I was for you.

And it's kind of where I feel
the disconnect is, like...

I don't know if I can ever be that,
honestly.

When you say you don't really need
that reassurance and affection,
I personally do think you do.
I do need it.

-And I think we are in different stages.
-But with you I feel

like I need it more with you because
you don't give me really anything.

You do deserve someone
who is giving you a better time.
I'm not going to change who I am,

I'm not going to try to be less
than who I am.

-I want someone who will like me.
-I agree.
And want me for who I am.
I agree with you.

I am honestly, like,
relieved we're having this conversation.

I mean, I did have genuine
feelings for you.
But new people are coming,

I'm going to give them the time of day,
I am going to feel them out.

I definitely will be super respectful
and honest.
Yeah.

We just both want different things
in a relationship, in that aspect.
That is really what it comes down to.

But don't get me wrong,
I do like Kierstan.
[moans] Give me a hug.

[Matthew] Oof,
talk about a change in atmosphere.

p.span: Not the moon, it doesn't have one.
And the villa will be rocked again
when the gravity of the results
of your vote are revealed later.
Okay, back to the sad guitar.

div.p:
Honestly, like, y'all know
how much I like him,
and it is not that he doesn't like me,

it's just that we can't get to where
we want each other to be.

And it is going to feel weird,
but I need to be distracted
with some other guys.

-You did the hardest part.
-Yeah, I'm so proud of you.

-that's never easy.
-[Mackenzie] Very proud of you.

[Kierstan] I mean, it sucks,
but I am honestly okay.
[Connor chuckles]

-Oh wow, thank you so much.
